title: Botting in ARAM
body:
Well, since my other post was just deleted in the other channel instead of moving it here, I guess I have to repost here.  Any Idea why there is so much botting happening in ARAM mode?  I get on maybe once or twice a week to play a good ARAM game, maybe once or twice we would get a bot with the 8-9 live players.  Now, it seems to be completely the other way around, 8-9 of the players are bots ( and you don't have to look that awful hard to determine they are bots ).  
I really like ARAM game mode and would like it to continue, but right now it seems that I can't.  Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Hit 30, get your ARAM MMR up...Bots are gone then.
Bots are always gonna be an issue.
They do ban them in waves so whoever is making/using them can't figure out what triggers the system.

>
> Hit 30, get your ARAM MMR up...Bots are gone then.

> They do ban them in waves so whoever is making/using them can't figure out what triggers the system.

every time i hear about a ban wave i just thing of a giant tidal wave of spinning ban hammers >.<
i am a level 30 and i experience allot of bots just played a game where my team was 4 bots and me.  It is quite obvious they are bots please address this issue!!!
Most of the bots are under lvl 30. At lvl 30, you never see them.

Wow the bots.  I had a game with 7 bots, 3 real players...  I have maybe 1 in 5 without 1-4 obvious bots in an ARAM game.

Bots are ruining this game for me.

Adding support to this huge issue.

I've run into dozens of ARAM bots today, alone. smh.

Personally, I consider it a kind of lottery. Specific to ARAM. Sometimes you have 0 bots, sometimes you have 9. Sometimes your team is all bots, sometimes the enemy team is. I dunno, but looking at it like a "lottery" of sorts makes it a little easier to stomach all the botting.

I have never seen a bot in ARAM. 
Is it a new account, or suffering from extremely low ELO? Typically bots are outleveled before you even hit lv30..
I havent run in to any bots since the game mode came out.
